title: BitHome
author: BitHome
content: We are seeking a campaign manager for an ANN and other campaigns such as a bounty, giveaway etc.Please DM us here or on twitter at https://twitter.com/BitHomefinance BitHome (can be found at https://bithome.finance/) a new platform that aims to make interacting with mining and staking of digital assets simple and fun, has launched. The platform provides easy-to-use tools for both Proof-of-Work (POW) and Proof-of-Stake (POS) and allows users to leverage their personal computers to earn through mining and staking.The BitHome ecosystem consists of a web platform, a miner software that can be downloaded and run on personal computers, and the native BitHome Coin (HOME). The platform allows users to track and monitor their earnings, stake HOME for additional rewards, and withdraw earnings. The miner software is simple to install and can be monitored and managed remotely on the BitHome platform. The native HOME token is used to reward miners and stakers for their participation in the ecosystem.For more information please see - https://bithome.finance/Kind regards and please DM us here or on twitter to discuss campaign management.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: This is an altcoin discussion board. You should move this thread to services, that's what you are looking for: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0There are already ton of bounty campaign Management & marketing services to choose from. Just be sure to hire an experienced manager. It will save you time.
